verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a letter to President Trump] , [ARG0: he] [V: said] [ARG1: the agency is laden with " bureaucratic incompetence " hidden by the Obama administration] .
In a letter to President Trump , he said the agency [V: is] laden with " bureaucratic incompetence " hidden by the Obama administration .
In a letter to President Trump , he said the agency is laden with [ARG1: " bureaucratic incompetence "] [V: hidden] [ARG0: by the Obama administration] .
